title: following provisions of the Civil Registration (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 34
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Registration (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Registration (Amendment) Act 

2014 (Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil registration (amendment) act 2014 (commencement) order 2020

title: following provisions of the Civil Registration (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 34
heading: 2. The 20th day of November 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of November 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Civil Registration (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 34 
of 2014) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

sections 5, 7, 8, 9, 11 and 13; 

section 15(a); 

section 19(1); 

(d) 

section 26(1); 

(e) 

paragraphs (a) and (c) of section 27; 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

section 28; 

section 29(a); 

section 30(a); 

sections 31 to 34. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 November, 2020. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [550] 3
text_norm: 2 20th day november 2020 appointed day following provision civil registration (amendment) act 2014 (no 34 2014) shall come operation (a) (b) (c) section 5 7 8 9 11 13 section 15(a) section 19(1) (d) section 26(1) (e) paragraph (a) (c) section 27 (f) (g) (h) (i) section 28 section 29(a) section 30(a) section 31 34 given official seal 26 november 2020 heather humphreys minister social protection notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st december 2020 550 3

title: following provisions of the Civil Registration (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 34
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement of various sections of the Civil 
Registration (Amendment) Act 2014 with effect from the 20th of November
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) order provides commencement various section civil registration (amendment) act 2014 effect 20th november
